title: (x) Sports/Athletic "N Elite" - Capitals {Todd Marx (self)}
content:
Hi, I am looking for the name of this font used for most sports type Letter Jackets and whatnot. Any help appreciated. I know this is probably a common font, but I can't seem to locate the exact font. Many are close, but have very subtle differences. (Collegiate, Indiana, Princetown, etc.)

Font example
NEAS logo.bmp (127.5 k)
author: mrslate

comments.content:
The forums do not support Windows bitmap files directly, Todd. I have reposted your logo in JPEG format so folks can more easily take a peek at it.   
   
 ![NEAS Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174609im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/34556.jpg)
After much searching, the answer? A Mac font, Capitols, it was just modified...
